title: New free champion rotation: Jhin, Vayne, Tahm Kench and more!

replies.body: are we gonna get a change for the adc's or are we gonna have the same rotation of jhin and sivir most weeks? Just wondering cause now that you have made it harder to get BE I can't get cool new champs anymore and the champs that I do get outta capsules are the 450 and 1350 ones that I already have and translate into like only 1000 BE which is nothing.
